name: QuickPerfTest
description: Runs the quick web performance test in cloud, with Visual Studio Online
helpMarkDown: This task can be used to trigger a Cloud-based Load Test using Visual Studio Online. [Learn more](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=613203).
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: Registered connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a previously registered service connection to talk to the Cloud-based Load Test service. Choose 'Manage' to register a new connection.

inputs.name: websiteUrl
inputs.label: Website Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter your application website url as http://www.your.app/home.html

inputs.name: testName
inputs.label: Test Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name the load test for tracking and correlation.

inputs.name: vuLoad
inputs.label: User Load
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum virtual users concurrently accessing the website.

inputs.name: runDuration
inputs.label: Run Duration (sec)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Load test run duration in seconds.

inputs.name: geoLocation
inputs.label: Load Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Geographical region to generate the load from. See task help for more details.
